title: New: Milo M – Suburbia
body:
Banjos ruin 99% of songs; that’s a factually correct statistic.

Thankfully for us and for **Milo M**, the gentle strumming of the banjo perfectly compliments his pensive vocals on his debut track _Suburbia_. Downcast and enchantingly moody, there’s hints of Dylan, amidst touches of **Kim Janssen** and **The Tallest Man On Earth**, yet adopting a more mystical atmosphere. Check out _Suburbia_ below.
